participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Reserved yet hopeful, she often reflects on her past choices.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Energetic and compassionate, he thrives on helping others and staying active.
participant_2.background: i enjoy being around people. i like to workout a a times a week. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i am a professional wrestler.
